00036 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'model.php');
00037 
00038 class Ftpproxy extends Model
00039 {
00040     public $Name= 'ftp-proxy';
00041     public $User= 'proxy';
00042     
00043     public $LogFile= '/var/log/ftp-proxy.log';
00044     
00045     function Ftpproxy()
00046     {
00047         global $TmpFile;
00048         
00049         parent::Model();
00050         
00051         $this->StartCmd= "/usr/sbin/ftp-proxy -vv -D6 > $TmpFile 2>&1 &";
00052     }
00053                     
00054     function ParseLogLine($logline, &$cols)
00055     {
00056         global $Re_Ip;
00057 
00058         if ($this->ParseSyslogLine($logline, $cols)) {
00059             //#1 FTP session 1/100 started: client 192.168.1.1 to server 129.128.5.191 via proxy 10.0.0.13
00060             $re= "/FTP session \d+\/\d+ started: client ($Re_Ip) to server ($Re_Ip)/";
00061             if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00062                 $cols['Client']= $match[1];
00063                 $cols['Server']= $match[2];
00064             }
00065             return TRUE;
00066         }
00067         return FALSE;
00068     }
00069 }
00070 ?>
